changes: Added more robust crop-puzzle endpoint with advanced detection techniques
Introduced new request and response models with detailed configuration options
Implemented confidence scoring and warning generation for grid detection
key_additions: CropPuzzleRequest model with multiple detection configuration options
CropPuzzleResponse model with comprehensive grid detection metadata

patterns_discovered: Enhanced error handling with granular error messages
Flexible configuration for image processing with multiple detection strategies
Confidence-based grid detection with fallback mechanisms
Detailed metadata generation to support downstream AI processing
gotchas_discovered: Grid detection can fail due to image quality or unusual puzzle layouts
Different detection methods may yield varying results
Padding and boundary exclusion require precise configuration

improvements: More robust image processing with multiple detection techniques
Better error reporting and confidence tracking
Flexible configuration for different puzzle types
Enhanced metadata for AI-assisted puzzle solving

recommendations: Add unit tests for different grid detection scenarios
Implement logging to track detection performance
Create a configuration system to dynamically adjust detection parameters
Develop a visualization tool to help users understand grid detection results
